The term "Software defined radio'( SDR) has been used for a long time already, but real products have only been released mostly within the last 10 years," Virtanen told Betanews on Tuesday. By using software, radio development is more flexible, fixes and updates can be made more easily and cost effectively, new functionalities and features can be implemented and mobilized faster, and software code can be re-used.
